body.description: This lightweight hydrator with .5% Salicylic Acid helps clear and prevent breakouts while improving tone and texture in acne-prone, sensitive skin. Balanced formula includes nourishing botanicals and prebiotic complex to alleviate dryness and helps soothe the appearance of acne redness. It helps to absorbs excess oil and provides a matte finish for softer, smoother skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CETAPHIL GENTLE CLEAR Triple-Action Serum reduces the appearance of blemishes in 72 hours. It soothes and conditions sensitive, breakout prone skin without over drying, providing 24 hour hydration. This triple-action serum is formulated to treat current acne, prevent future breakouts and improve the appearance of uneven skin tone and acne related redness. This comforting, milky gel-serum is formulated with 0.5% salicylic acid to treat acne, plus a unique blend of gentle, skin soothing and refining ingredients for smoother, clearer skin. The gentle formula contains PHA, succinic acid, niacinamide, zinc and prebiotics. CETAPHIL GENTLE CLEAR products are clinically tested on sensitive skin. This soothing face serum is fragrance free, oil free, hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic, designed to be gentle and non-irritating on sensitive skin. Tackle sensitive skin with the help of CETAPHIL. A weakened skin barrier lets more water out while letting irritants in, both of which can lead to dryness and sensitivity. By helping to strengthen and reinforce the skin barrier, CETAPHIL skincare products defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity - dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrier.

CETAPHIL is a Dermatologist Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand used around the world by millions of people with sensitive skin. CETAPHIL moisturizers deliver long lasting hydration to replenish and protect the skin's moisture barrier from dryness. Developed for and clinically tested by dermatologists to be proven gentle on sensitive skin.

Cleanse skin with a gentle yet effective CETAPHIL facial cleanser Start your skincare routine with CETAPHIL GENTLE CLEAR Clarifying Acne Cream Cleanser, a gentle salicylic acid cleanser designed for sensitive, breakout prone skin. This soothing cream gently deep cleans your skin, removing pore-clogging impurities while helping to treat and prevent breakouts. Apply it to dampened skin and gently massage. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry. Treat acne breakouts and marks with a salicylic acid serum Use CETAPHIL GENTLE CLEAR Triple-Action Serum to treat your sensitive, breakout prone skin. Treat and prevent breakouts while improving the appearance of uneven skin tone. This milky gel-serum soothes the skin and provides 24 hour hydration. After cleansing the skin, apply a thin layer to the face. Immediately follow with a facial moisturizer to lock in hydration Follow up with a moisturizer that's suitable for your skin type, such as CETAPHIL GENTLE CLEAR Mattifying Acne Moisturizer to strengthen the skin barrier and moisturize the skin for 48 hour hydration. This acne treatment moisturizer helps to clear breakouts and prevent new breakouts from forming, while also helping to relieve acne-related redness and irritation. Complete your sensitive skincare routine with CETAPHIL A daily skincare routine with CETAPHIL cleansers and moisturizers designed for your sensitive, breakout prone skin will help to defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity and leave your skin feeling soothed and nourished. All CETAPHIL products are effective yet non-irritating and dermatologist tested for sensitive skin.

Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Skincare Benefit Oil-free, Bi-phase formula effortlessly removes stubborn makeup Removes excess surface oils, dirt, and makeup to leave skin feeling refreshed Deep cleans without over-drying while immediately working to reduce breakouts Combines blemish fighting power with a unique blend of gentle, skin-soothing and refining ingredients for smoother, more clear skin Hydrates for 48 hours while reducing breakouts Broad spectrum SPF protection that absorbs oil while moisturizing skin Skin Type Sensitive skin/All Skin Types Sensitive skin/Combination to oil Sensitive, blemish prone Sensitive, blemish prone Sensitive, blemish prone Sensitive skin/Oily Skin Key Ingredients Aloe Vera, Ginseng & Green Tea Hydrating Glycerin, Essential Vitamin B3 & Pro-Vitamin B5 Salicylic Acid, While Tea & Aloe Vera Salicylic Acid, PHA Succinic Acid, Niacinamide Zinc & Prebiotics Salicylic Acid, Bisabolol & Preboitcs Micropearl technology and Oleosome technology Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Won't clog pores (Non-comedogenic) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fragrance Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This has been working really well on my breakouts especially around the chin and jaw area where I get it the most. Amazing stuff and it's gentle as well. It doesn't irritate my skin or dry it out. I'm really happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for me
reviews.reviewText: I've had this for a month now. It's moisturising without making my face oily and shiny. It might not be enough moisturising for those with dry-normal skin. I'm not getting any new pimples after I use it and my skin seems to like this moisturiser. This cream does not have a silicone feel to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My second or third purchase.
reviews.reviewText: It is really great in its ability to provide a matt moisture look without looking like its excess goop!It's easy for traveling. The price is very reasonable for a product of its quality.Did not ever cause breakout on my face.My favorite feature!!!! It minimizes pores on my nose! Their description of "Mattifying" means it covers small imperfections due to acne breakouts; and as I said above it minimizing pores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought this moisturizer to help with my oiliness when I go out. I try to buy lightweight moisturizers so it doesn’t leave a build up on my face and cause excess oil or breakouts. I bought this due to some reviews saying it helped on there oily skin a when I first tried it, I was amazed. Fast forward about the 4th time using it, going outside of the house. I decided to go out to grab a bite to eat an put this on about an hour before I was to go out. My face started to get oily again on my forehead and nose. I know the directions say you can replace up to 3 times a day so no biggie just added a little more and oiliness was gone. Bam!! My skin did not become overly oily and it held for about a hour again, got home washed my face. Had it on less than 3 hours, touched up twice. But after a few days of using it here and there, I started breaking out more. I thought it was just random so I stopped using it just in case and my acne started going away, no new breakouts. I waited about a week or so an tried again. It was fine for a few days but constantly having to reapply or clean my face throughly to start again to avoid the excess oil an it bought my breakouts back days after. I mainly breakout on my cheeks and my neck. I’ve been using this for about 5 weeks just to give a reference on time. I do have to say I have mixed reviews on this.Pros1) it does take away the oil effortlessly..2) it doesn’t smell bad3) it’s small an convenient to take anywhere for a touch up.4) it goes nicely under makeup ( I tried once)5) it’s creamy an smooth.6) price is goodCons1) you have to reapply numerously2) some might not like the chemical smell3) due to reapplying, you might run out the product quicker4) potential breakouts ( I have but some might some may not.)5) Not sure how it would hold up in higher temperatures outdoors/indoors. ( it’s been cooler where I live so can’t say if you will reapply more.6) not sure how it works to reapply with makeup on. I did not leave mine on long enough to know.Overall it’s a good product if you may not be sensitive to breakouts or you feel like reapplying might be an issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is top tier, it’s hard on the skin. Has a great smell and the texture is smooth. When it dries it feels like nothing is on your face, absolutely no residue and it isn’t oily. Perfect for oily skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 3rd update: I realized I can't use other moisturizers, Ive gotten too used to this product. I've tried using other products of moisturizers and they felt HEAVY and sticky. This is VERY light weight which I appreciate. That is all☺️7 month update: I tend to sweat profusely especially in the summer time around my scalp and forehead. I waited to update to see how to use this best. While using this product i found that using a smaller amount was best. If you tend to sweat a lot like me, use toner then apply a pea - pea and a 1/2 size amount of moisturizer. I still tend to sweat till it runs into my eyes, but using less moisturizer prevented the product from running into my eye while sweating.I use this before putting on my makeup and it doesn't feel caked.I have oily skin prone to break outs and wanted to start using a cream after washing my face due to feeling dry afterwords. I dont have a beauty routine, rarely use makeup, nor informed on beauty trends etc but I wanted to start taking better care of my appearance lately.I compared different pricing for (oily skin/acne control) face moisturizers both online and my local Walgreens and Walmart. Note: the cream I was looking for had to be safe for sensitive skin as I suffer from eczema and remembered Cetaphil was one of the brands my doctor said was more natural and safer.I've been using this for about 2 weeks now.Result: it doesn't burn and no signs of inflammation. It doesn't smell great but it helps A LOT with not feeling dry from washing. It does not mattify my skin as it states and my oilyness is about the same throughout my regular work days.But it did do something when I saw myself in my review mirror when the sun was on my face. I noticed my face shined all over where I placed this cream. I just learned of the glass face look beauty trend and it looks slightly similar to that effect from the use of this cream on my face. I've had compliments on my skin from clients/family which is nice to hear.I usually wash my face with a acne face wash for oily skin, use a toner and a brightening eye serum from my local Ross store, and this cream to "seal" it all in.I admit I tend to touch my face out of habit which causes a pimple to come out.I will be editing my review in the summer as I tend to sweat profusely from my scalp/face and will note if this cream if bothersome or not.Overall it helps with dryness and it helps my skin look nice and shiny (vibrant?) in the sun so I'm happy with the product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have super oily skin and have been looking for something to just tone down the shine. This isn’t my favorite. It does mattify upon application but doesn’t take long to not only get shiny, but feel more oily on the skin. It makes my skin feel soft, but feels like a thick layer. I hate how much skincare product I put on my face to begin with, I didn’t like how this felt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just rebought this product. It has worked wonders and saved my skin. I paired this up with a spot treatment and can feel my skin making a comeback.p.s listen to the comments about adding an extra moisturizer. I like to layer after this though.
